title: A tough spring
authors: Richard Davies, Hannah Cantekin, Camila Arroyo
subtitle: This week we look at jobs and pay. Big policy changes—to taxation, and to minimum wages—were put in place in April. It could be a tough spring for young workers.
intro: What are the most important measures in an economy? Is it imports and exports? With all the recent trade talk—including our newsletters on Liberation Day and Britain’s Steel crisis—you might think so. Perhaps it is investment or R&D spending?
